name: Pixel Creator 1.2
description:
This is a game that I am working on where you create and share levels. This is just an updated version of the game. ok cool (you can't actually share levels tho ok cool bye)

Edit Mode Controls:
A and D to switch blocks
Enter to switch to Play/Edit
Hold and Drag mouse to place blocks

Play Mode Controls:
WASD/Arrow Keys to move
Space/W to Jump
Use mouse to grab on grapple blocks (blue blocks) (also make sure the mouse points towards the grapple block)

I also added a Challenge Mode, in which it randomly generates a level and you can play it.
Challenge Mode Controls:
WASD/Arrow Keys to move
Mouse to grapple
Get to finish (aka green gradient)

webgl version here: https://simmer.io/@enemi44/cool-game-maybe-ok

ok cool bye
